estimatedMinutes.description: Estimated number of minutes you plan to use the browser session

connectUrl.description: WebSocket URL to connect to the browser via CDP (Chrome DevTools Protocol)

expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session expires

paidMinutes.description: Number of minutes prepaid for this session

sessionId.description: Unique identifier for the browser session

resources.description: Base coin price mini-endpoint for major tokens only. Returns spot prices and 24h stats for well-known tickers like btc, solana, eth, xmr, ltc and other large-cap coins, never microcaps. Pass an optional ticker to get a single-coin 24h snapshot with price, symbol, changeRate, changePrice, high and low, or omit ticker to receive a compact basket of top tokens in a fixed order. Cost: 0.001 USDC per request.

accepts.description: Base coin price mini-endpoint for major tokens only. Returns spot prices and 24h stats for well-known tickers like btc, solana, eth, xmr, ltc and other large-cap coins, never microcaps. Pass an optional ticker to get a single-coin 24h snapshot with price, symbol, changeRate, changePrice, high and low, or omit ticker to receive a compact basket of top tokens in a fixed order. Cost: 0.001 USDC per request.

ticker.description: Optional ticker symbol for a single major token (case-insensitive). Examples: btc, solana, eth, xmr, ltc. When omitted the endpoint returns a compact basket of top tokens instead.

changePrice.description: Absolute 24h price change over the recent period for the asset (single mode only).

changeRate.description: Relative 24h change rate over the recent period for the asset (single mode only).

high.description: 24h high price for the asset (single mode only).

low.description: 24h low price for the asset (single mode only).

mode.description: Result mode: 'single' when ticker is provided, 'top' when ticker is omitted.

price.description: Spot price for the asset, using the upstream best bid/last price in a stable quote asset.

prices.description: For mode='top': ordered array of { ticker, symbol, price } for a fixed basket of major tokens, in the order: btc, solana, eth, xmr, bnb, xrp, trx, doge, ada, bch, hype, link, leo, xlm, zec, ltc, avax, hbar, dai, shib, ton, mnt, wlfi, cro.

symbol.description: Upstream trading symbol for the asset (e.g. BTC-USDT for single mode, or base asset symbol like BTC in the top basket).

ticker.description: Normalized lower-case ticker that was resolved (single mode only).

handle.description: X handle (username) without the @ prefix, for example WURKDOTFUN or statikheadz.
Normalized X handle that was requested.

price_usdc.description: Fixed price charged for this call in USDC (6 decimals).

profile.description: Full upstream X profile payload for the user, including core fields like id, rest_id, name, screen_name, description, avatar, location and counters.

tweet_count.description: Number of recent tweets returned (up to 10).

tweets.description: Array of up to 10 recent tweets with trimmed but useful metadata: id, text (max 3000 chars; longer texts are truncated), created_at, language, basic user info, engagement metrics, media and links.

chain.description: Blockchain to query (e.g., base, ethereum, bsc, solana)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10, max: 500)

resources.description: Skill Security Scanner  Static security scanner for AI agent skills. Detects 90+ malicious patterns including code execution, shell injection, data exfiltration, credential theft, persistence mechanisms, prompt injection, and obfuscation. Returns a structured threat report with severity levels and line-by-line findings.

accepts.description: Skill Security Scanner  Static security scanner for AI agent skills. Detects 90+ malicious patterns including code execution, shell injection, data exfiltration, credential theft, persistence mechanisms, prompt injection, and obfuscation. Returns a structured threat report with severity levels and line-by-line findings.

resources.description: AI forensic verdict by Marcus Aurelius (Claude Sonnet 4). One-paragraph analysis with risk score, key flags, and Stoic wisdom. The only LLM-powered crypto forensic analyst on x402. ~5s latency. Cost: $0.15 via x402.

accepts.description: AI forensic verdict by Marcus Aurelius (Claude Sonnet 4). One-paragraph analysis with risk score, key flags, and Stoic wisdom. The only LLM-powered crypto forensic analyst on x402. ~5s latency. Cost: $0.15 via x402.

example.analysis: This token has all the hallmarks of a rug pull...
example.recommendation: Do not touch. The deployer is a known serial rugger.

resources.name: CDP Facilitator
resources.description: Best-in-class x402 facilitator. Fee-free USDC settlement on Base Mainnet. KYT/OFAC checks on every transaction.

resources.name: Corbits
resources.description: A production grade facilitator which supports multi-network, multi-token, multi-payment schemes.

resources.name: Mogami facilitator
resources.description: A free, developer-focused, production-ready facilitator for x402 payments. Use it instantly online, or launch your own Docker image in seconds.

resources.name: OpenX402.ai Facilitator
resources.description: The first permissionless, gasless and omnichain x402 facilitator that any x402 server can use without login

resources.name: PayAI Facilitator
resources.description: Accept x402 payments on all networks including Avalanche, Base, Polygon, Sei, Solana, and more! Get started in less than 1 minute. Supports all tokens. No API Keys required.

resources.name: Treasure Facilitator
resources.description: Treasure x402 Facilitator available on Base and Base Sepolia. Supports EIP-3009 compliant tokens including USDC, MAGIC, SMOL, MIO, AI Frens tokens, and more.

resources.name: WorldFun Facilitator
resources.description: AWE World.funs x402 Facilitator enables fee-free EIP-3009 payments in USDC and other ERC-20 tokens, handling verification and settlement on Base so developers dont need blockchain infrastructure.

resources.name: x402.org Facilitator
resources.description: Default testnet facilitator for x402

resources.name: x402.rs Facilitator
resources.description: Independent, open-source facilitator in Rust. Easy to self-host, extend to new networks, or use via our hosted instance.
